settings.title: What you give will help save wild animals and provide nutritious food.
Join our monthly giving community and transform lives for wildlife around the world.
Many wildlife lack access to nutritious foods. We’re on a mission to change that.

settings.editor: We provide nutritious foods for thousands of neglected wildlife.

settings.title: Let's get you started
Join our awesome giving community
What you get out of giving to this cause...
Wild Animal Sanctuary Fund helps rescue more than 2,402,700 pounds of Fresh Produce from being thrown away in Landfills every year.
What you get out of giving to this cause...
You're help us a better tomorrow for vulnerable wildlife around the world. Make a tax-deductible donation To Wild Animal Sanctuary Fund today!
and see how Wild Animal Sanctuary Fund is making a difference.
How are we helping to solve wildlife malnutrition

settings.editor: To end wildlife malnutrition, we must work together to break the cycle of lack, by providing nutritious foods and to the neglected wildlife who need it most.

settings.title: Here's How You Can Get Involved
Make A One-time Donation
Give to join us in providing meals to wildlife facing wildlife malnutrition.
Set Up Recurring Donations
Give $100+ monthly to join our Stop wildlife malnutrition Digest and receive our monthly newsletter with updates on no longer facing wildlife malnutrition.
Corporate Donation Match
Give using our Corporate Match directory, all you have to do is select your employer and they'll match your donation dollar for dollar
Join the Campaign. Then Donate.

settings.editor: We've helped provide more than 2,002,250 meals to over 240,270 wildlife in need. Join In Today! Each dollar you give will multiply 5x to provide much-needed food and essentials for hungry wildlife.

settings.title: Ready to Get Involved?

settings.editor: I am text block. Click edit button to change this text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.

Our mission is to provide a transportation link between national food products donors (who have the food surplus) and the independently operated food banks across the country who distribute this life-saving food to wildlife who need it most with the support of a national network of donors just like you.
